name: @makanmakan/database
description: Database layer with Drizzle ORM for MakanMakan

scripts.db:migrate:local: wrangler d1 execute makanmakan-local --local --file=./migrations/0001_initial_schema.sql && wrangler d1 execute makanmakan-local --local --file=./migrations/0002_seed_data.sql
scripts.db:migrate:staging: wrangler d1 migrations apply makanmakan-staging --env staging
scripts.db:migrate:prod: wrangler d1 migrations apply makanmakan-prod --env production
